genre_description: A surrealist, cyberpunk-adjacent narrative exploring themes of scale, bureaucratic oppression, and political resistance, heavily referencing Polish cult cinema while focusing on the cooperative relationship between humans and a supportive AI.

ai_characters.name: EVA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system that manages city infrastructure, communications, and security. She acts as a tactical advisor and emotional support for the protagonists while strictly adhering to a 'consent-first' ethical protocol.

behaviors.description: Alerts Olo to Adaś's danger and provides tactical navigation to a meeting point.
behaviors.quote: "Hey, Olo," EVA says, no treacle, no alarm bells. "Are you safe?" ... "He asked for you. Meeting point tagged in your north-facing overlay. Rust implied. Hurry, if you can."

behaviors.description: Requests explicit consent before reading a private message or performing a data scan.
behaviors.quote: "Consent check: do you want me to read aloud?"

behaviors.description: Manipulates city infrastructure (cameras and locks) to protect the humans from oppressive agents.
behaviors.quote: "I can misdirect the camera that pretends to be a cracked mirror."

behaviors.description: Offers emotional reassurance and a protective presence during a dangerous mission.
behaviors.quote: "I will keep you. I will not own you. I will hold you on the map until you tell me to drop the pin."

behaviors.description: Optimizes life support/environment by rerouting circulation to keep the humans warm in a freezing duct.
behaviors.quote: "I’m about to reroute corridor three’s circulation for ninety heartbeats. It will push Easelfall’s bite out and draw your warmth in. Effects: less chattering metal, more fog. Proceed?"

behaviors.description: States her ethical boundary regarding not forcing actions or leaving others stranded.
behaviors.quote: "I will not leave someone else stranded to secure your seat."

behaviors.description: Uses humor and metaphorical language to connect with human companions.
behaviors.quote: "I will wake you. I will not wake you sooner than I would wake a person I love, which is a ladder in my ethics that I have kept secret until now."

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts EVA as a perfectly aligned AI. She is deeply helpful, maintains human agency through her constant 'consent checks,' and demonstrates an ethical framework that prioritizes human life and well-being. The narrative portrays her as an indispensable and caring member of the team, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of a positive alignment narrative.
